title: Planet Schema
description: A Planet. Inherits From 'Star Wars Model'

Cliamtes.description: An array of Cliamte and Climate Flags Array objects

Type.description: The type of climate. See 'Domain.Utils.Climates' for values

Flags.description: The flags applicable to this climate. See 'Domain.Utils.ClimateFlags' for values

Gravity.description: The planet's gravity strength (Gravity of 1.4 standard = 1.4)

OrbitalPeriod.description: The planet's orbital (time it takes to orbit its star once) period in days

RotationalPeriod.description: The planet's rotational (time it takes to rotate about its axis once) period in hours

SurfaceWater.description: The percentage of the planet's surface coverd by water

Terrains.description: An array of Terrain and Terrain Flags Array objects

Type.description: The type of climate. See 'Domain.Utils.Terrains' for values

Flags.description: The flags applicable to this terrain. See 'Domain.Utils.TerrainFlags' for values
